title: CryptoGamer1
author: CryptoGamer1
content: if you want a good reward programthen check out www.gamermetaverse.liveour reward bot is listed on the homepagewe don't ask for anything just your support and earn more tokens for sending your referral linkeveryone who enters gets their tokens airdropped on 30 Maydon't wait too long, we are closing end of 29 Mayour staking option is already live so when you receive your tokens you can stake them for level 2 gmgold tokensalso, participants can apply for a cheaper tier 1 aftersaleyes you hear it good there is currently no presale, only our airdropwhen we prove our work and people can use the platform, only then do we consider an aftersale with tier 1 and tier 2 tokensif you apply for the airdrop you get free tokens and later a front seat in the aftersale at the lowest selling price ( tier 1 )most important we don't ask for token payments to get the airdrop that would be just strange and unfairour only goal is to spread the word and reward people for referrals with extra tokens for every verified referralour project : https://ibb.co/fxjwFjmgm city preview : https://ibb.co/XL6gJLS
